result.name: YouTube Real Cinema Mode
result.description:
Don't like these small videos on YouTube pages? Me too. So one day I decided to change that and created this userstyle.
This style expands video to fill all free space inside the browser window. Like a fullscreen YouTube but not fullscreen. You'll like it!
Scroll YouTube page down to see comments and other stuff. Move the cursor up and the top bar with the search will appear.
It also shows a floating miniplayer in the corner when you read comments. You can disable this in options if you don't like it.
result.notes: If you have any suggestions for improvement of this userstyle please leave a feedback message. ___________ Changelog: 13 oct 2023 - Added the Auto Scrollbar option that shows the scrollbar in the comments section and pages without the player but hides it when the big "theater" player is on screen. 5 oct 2023 - Added optional floating miniplayer in comments section. 25 aug 2023 - Added automatic top menu display on scroll for new browsers that support this feature. 22 aug 2023 - Every day something new. Fixed overlapping bottom columns on videos. 18 aug 2023 - Fix for one renamed id in layout. 5 jul 2023 - Fix after recent YouTube layout changes. 29 apr 2021 - Quick fix due to recent YouTube layout changes. 13 mar 2021 - YouTube moved the scrollbar from html to body so there's a small fix to hide it again. 30 may 2019 - Autoplay switch is now accessible when a video is not in theater mode. 19 apr 2019 - Option to hide or show the scrollbar (hide by default). Also fixed the color of the top bar. 7 apr 2019 - Fixed the close button position on panels like multicam or share panel. 26 jul 2018 - Yep, YouTube changed something again and I fixed something. Again. 16 jul 2018 - Fix for ℹ️ button at the right top corner and drawer. Now it is accessible and not overlapped by top panel. 14 jul 2018 - Quickfix for another one update of YouTube. 17 jun 2018 - Options and support for old (pre-2017) YouTube design is removed. 18 sep 2017 - Fixed a bug where low res videos did not stretch to the full screen. 16 sep 2017 - Finally support for the new YouTube design! If you want you can select an old version in Advanced Style Settings. 5 jun 2017 - YAY! 100k downloads! Thank you all! 3 sep 2016 - 50000+ Installs Celebration Update. Settings! Now you can choose to hide the top bar or not. Thank you all for using and sharing this style! - One more thing today. No longer need for positioning the settings menu after some update of YouTube so I removed this code. 8 jun 2016 - Position problem fixed. I guess. 9 may 2016 - 360 videos is stretched to full screen now, although on some screens it can have a slight discrepancy in aspect ratio. - Centered annotations. Accessible but not fitted properly. - Settings menu is not in the right corner anymore. 7 may 2016 - Little fix for 360 videos. Now they are displayed in the center, but not stretch on the entire screen yet. - Playlist box not hides behind the video anymore. - Tooltip text and rewind thumbnails now displayed at the bottom of the screen, not in the center. - And one more fix for content under the video. 30 dec 2015 - Fix for ad box. Now it expands properly. 28 dec 2015 - Some animation improvements
